article: This morning I was at my favorite table at a local restaurant when an elderly couple walked in. They both had gray21 _ and the woman was wearing a soft pink sweater under her coat. I noticed that when they got in line they were22 _ hands. It touched my heart. I watched them for a while, thinking about my own23 _ . In truth, it gave me a warm feeling to do it, to honor them for the31 _ they'd given me. Giving not only32 _ the receiver but also the giver. It's an activity that makes us realize we're all33 _ . That association plays a big part in making the world a(n)34 _ place for people to live in,35 _ end you are in.
